snippet.title: Roaming - The Gap (Release Trailer)
snippet.description:
The Gap is set to release on April 14th. 

While the story mode presents a tense world shrouded in darkness, players may also enjoy exploring the contrasts of the free roam mode on this lonely street corner.

The Gap is a first-person horror experience taking place in a ghostly abandoned house on a lonely street corner. You don't know what forces compelled you to come here, but it is clear someone is living inside.

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2345630/The_Gap/

Follow me on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/MementoGameDev
